BnF “4-IMPROR-77 (B)”. — See p. 18, no. 54. — The same proofreadings with black ink handwritten corrections are found in Vinson et al. (1866-, f1-f49).

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

commentary preamble
Eṇṇiya veṇṇiya veytupa kaṇṇutaṟ pavaḷa mālvaira payanta kavaḷa yāṉaiyiṉ kaḻalpaṇi vōrē Intiraṉ mutaliya viṟaiyavar
pataṅkaḷu mantami liṉpatu taḻivil vīṭuneṟi yaṟinteytutaṟ kuriya māntāk kuṟitipayappa vuyarntōrā ṉēṭukkappaṭṭa poruṉāṉka
vai yaṟamporuḷiṉpavī ṭeṉpaṉavaṟṟuḷ ~ vīṭepatu cintaiyu moḻiyuñ cellā nilamaittātaliṟṟuṟa vaṟamāki
ya kāraṇavakaiyāṟ kūṟappaṭuvatallatilak kaṇvakaiyāṟ kūṟappaṭālaiyi ṉūlkaḷāṟ kūṟappaṭuvaṉa preface to the commentary ending on f2r, l. 5
Akara mutala veḻuttellā māti pakavaṉ mutaṟṟē yulaku ~

Etu ~ Akaramākiya mutalaiyuṭaiya veḻuttukkaḷellā matupōlavāti pakavaṉā
kiya mutalaiyuṭait tulakameṉṟavāṟu – Itu talaimaipaṟṟivanta veṭuttukkāṭṭuvamai
Ūṭutal kāmattiṟ kiṉpa mataṟkiṉpaṅ kūṭi muyaṅkap peṟiṉ ~

Etu ~ Itu kāmanukarccik kiṉpamāvatu Ataṉai
nukartaṟ kuriyārāvā rārāmaipaṟṟit tammuḷūṭutal Avvūṭutaṟkiṉpa māvatu Ataṉai yaḷavaṟintu nīṅkit tammuṭ kūṭi muyaṅkutal kūṭu
māyi ṉammuyakkameṉṟavāṟu – kūṭutalotta vaḷaviḷarātal mutirntu tuṉiyāya vaḻittuṉpam payattalāṉun tāmutirnta pulaviyāya vaḻikkalaviyi
ṉpam payamāmaiyāṉu miraṇṭaṟku miṭaiyākiya vaḷavaṟintu nīkkutalāteṉpatu paṟṟik kūṭṭi muyaṅkap peṟiṉeṉṟāṉ Avviraṇṭiṉpamum
yāṉ peṟṟēṉeṉapatām yīṇṭup piriviṉai vaṭanūṉ matampaṟṟic celavāṟṟāmai vituppup pulaviyeṉa nālvakaiya tākkik kūṟiṉār Ava
ṟṟuṭ celavupirivāṟṟāmai yuḷḷumāṟṟāmai paṭarmelintiraṅkaṉamutaṉiṟai yaḻitalīḷa yavaṟṟuḷḷuvituppuvarvayiṉa vatumpaḷamutaṟ puṇarcci
vitumpavīḷu yavaṟṟuḷḷum pulavi neñcoṭu pulattaṉamutalātalu vakaiyīrā yavaṟṟuḷḷuṅ kaṇṭukoḷka ~ Aḵtela vaṭanūlāri
vaṟṟuṭaṉē pāvattīṉṉāyaṉīkkattiṉaiyuṅ kūṭṭip piriviṉaiyai vakaitteṉṟārāleṉi ṉaḵtaṟamporuḷiṉpaṅ kiṉeṉum pa
yaṉ kaṇāṭuḷāṉṟupaṟṟi yataṉmaiyāṉu muṉivarāṉaiyā ṉorukāl kutōr kuṟṟattuḷatāvatalla tulakiyal pāyvārāmaiyā
